content: police box sox by audry nicklin top down socks featuring a certain time-travelling police box bear-ears com finished measurements notes small large the socks are knit top down a different toe and heel can be 7½ 9 / 19 23 cm around ball of foot and calf unstretched used in place of the recommended ones in both sock sizes the idea behind having more stitches yarn around the colorwork is that stranding colorwork does not knitsch 100% merino sock 182 yds/ 166m per 1 76oz/ 50g stretch as much as the surrounding stockinette rather than 100% merino wool fingering weight go up in needle size to create more stretch stitches are in- 3 3 skeins in tennant mc creased around the colorwork portion of the sock koigu kpm 175yds/ 160m per 1 76oz/ 50g 100% merino however if the colorwork is still too tight to allow the sock to wool fingering weight fit over the heel a larger needle size can be used in addition 1 1 skein in 5618 snow cc1 to the increased number of stitches 1 1 skein in 5601 night cc2 or abbreviations approximately 364 438 yds/ 333 400 m mc 20 30 yds/ 18 5 27 m cc1 cc1 contrast color 1 18 25 yds/ 16 5 23 m cc2 cc2 contrast color 2 of a fingering weight yarn co cast on k knit needles & notions k1 tbl knit one through back loop size 0 us/ 2 0mm circular needle 32 / 80cm or preferred mc main color small circular method m1l make 1 left change needle size if needed in order to obtain the correct p purl gauge pm place marker 2 stitch markers round s round s rs right side gauge sl 1 slip 1 purlwise 32 stitches/ 46 row = 4x4 / 10x10cm in stockinette stitch st s stitch es sm slip marker ws wrong side wyib with yarn in back http //bear-ears com/ © audry nicklin 2011-2014 for personal use only all rights reserved v03 26 15 police box sox - 2 cuff gusset co 60 72 sts place marker and join in round careful not to next row rs pick up and knit the 18 slipped sts along the twist the stitches heel flap pick up an additional stitch between the heel flap next round k2 p2 and top of the foot pm this is now the beginning of the round continue in established pattern until cuff is 1½ / 4cm from round 1 k30 36 sts pm pick up an additional stitch between co edge the heel flap and top of the foot before picking up and knit- next round knit ting the 18 slipped sts along the heel flap knit to end 84 94 sts total size small only round 2 knit to first marker sm ssk knit to 2 sts before the next round k5 m1l 72sts marker k2tog round 3 knit size large only work rnds 2 and 3 until 60 72 stitches remain next
